DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the present investigation was to evaluate the effect of stevioside and rebaudioside on several variables related to caries development. Two approaches were performed: an in vitro evaluation of the growth of a culture of mutans streptococci and in vivo randomized study on the effect of a single rinse containing stevioside and rebaudioside on plaque-pH.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Stevia Rebaudiana Extracts on Different Variables Related to Caries: an in Vitro and in Vivo Evaluation.
